segments.text: Hi , good morning , you are so early today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , traffic wasn't much today , so I made it to the office earlier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . How long does it take you to reach the office every day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , about an hour or so .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that â€™ s quite a long journey . Do you drive a car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I take public transportation . It's safer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right ! But I get up a little late . That gives me no other option but to travel by motorcycle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , both have advantages and disadvantages .
segments.speaker: S1
